user.title: Road Speed Limits
user.description: Configure the Road Speed Limits integration. Provide separate sensors for Latitude and Longitude. API keys for TomTom and HERE Maps should be configured in secrets.yaml.

data_description.latitude_entity: Select the sensor entity that provides latitude.
data_description.longitude_entity: Select the sensor entity that provides longitude.
data_description.data_source: Choose the data source for speed limit information. OpenStreetMap is free. TomTom and HERE require API keys in secrets.yaml.
data_description.unit: Select the unit for displaying speed limits.
data_description.min_update_distance: Minimum distance in meters to move before triggering a new speed limit check. Higher values save API usage.
data_description.speed_entity: Entity providing vehicle speed in km/h. Used to bypass cache when moving fast.
